card_1.cardText:
NHL’S STANLEY CUP CHAMPIONSHIP
==============================

Underdog vs. Underdog
---------------------

> TheA **Las Vegas Knights**,A a team that didn’t even exist last year, faces off against the **Washington Capitals**, a team tortured by playoff losses.

flip: What You should Know

card_2.cardText:
Vegas Golden Knights
--------------------

> *   **New franchise:**A At one point, 500-1 odds to win championship.
> 
> _**aEverybody on this team has something to prove. We call ourselves aThe Golden Misfits’ for a reason. We’re doing a good job of proving everybody wrong.a**_
> 
> Ryan Reaves, Golden Knights, helped score winning goal that sent team to the Final.

card_3.cardText:
Washington Capitals
-------------------

> *   **Tortured Past:A** First Stanley Cup appearance in 20 yrs, never won.
> 
> **_“It’s unbelievable… I can’t explain my emotions. I’m just happy for my boys, for our organization, our fans — finally!”_**
> 
> Alex Ovechkin, Washington Capitals,A regarded as this generation's great goalscorer. This is his 1st Stanley Cup final.

card_10.cardText:
The best of 7 series starts Monday. Who ya got? Click for the full schedule for when to watch.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-05-24-nhl-stanley-cup/)

body:
• NHL Playoffs 2018: Vegas Golden Knights rewrite NHL history with Stanley Cup Final Berth:
    https://www.cbssports.com/nhl/news/nhl-playoffs-2018-vegas-golden-knights-rewrite-nhl-history-with-stanley-cup-final-berth/
  • Capitals vs. Lightning: A history of Washington D.C. playoff misery as the Capitals try to reverse it:
    https://www.sbnation.com/nhl/2018/5/23/17326266/dc-sports-capitals-lightning-game-7
  • 2018 Stanley Cup Final Schedule (all start times 8 p.m. ET)
    • Game 1: Monday, May 28
    • Game 2: Wednesday, May 30
    • Game 3: Saturday, June 2
    • Game 4: Monday, June 4
    • *Game 5: Thursday, June 7
    • *Game 6: Sunday, June 10
    • *Game 7: Wednesday, June 13
      * – if necessary
